Description:
Sensational Opportunity In A Fantastic Location
This property is an exciting opportunity for families, investors and developers alike. Set on a 607sqm block, the neighbouring property is also for sale. Therefore presenting a combined 1214sqm of land in the high-density growth zone across two titles. Inside, there's plenty of room for everyone with the home being extended to offer 4 bedrooms, three with built-in robes, two living spaces and an updated central bathroom. At the heart of the home the open plan lounge and updated kitchen and meals area offers air-conditioning and a gas heater for year round comfort. Outside, the north facing backyard has ample space, a free-standing garage and so much potential. Perfectly positioned within walking distance to Corio Shopping centre and all it has to offer, local schools, medical clinics, transport and great access to the Ring Road, you can't afford to miss this opportunity.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 36 Dearborn Parade, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Exciting Opportunity for Investors, Developers and Families
Centrally located, this 706sqm "growth zone" property is perfectly positioned for a range of buyers whether you're looking for a great development opportunity, a solid investment or family home. The current home offers three bedrooms, a refreshed bathroom and kitchen with dishwasher and formal lounge. Outside the huge backyard offers a dual carport with access through to the backyard, plus a number of sheds and a workshop for the DIY enthusiast. For those looking for a development opportunity, the excellent land size offers scope to keep the existing home and develop multiple dwellings at the rear or start fresh with a potential 4 or 5 lot sub division (STCA). Centrally located within walking distance to Corio Village Shopping Centre, schools, transport, doctors and with easy access to the Ring Road, don't miss this opportunity to secure a very versatile property.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 82 Bacchus Marsh Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Solid investment or mounting stepping stone.
This sparkling 70's solid brick veneer is built with the very best of quality complimented by the perfect touch of grace. A spacious three bedroom, one bathroom home with a single car garage, featuring hardwood timber floors, freshly painted crisp white walls, neat functional kitchen and a large low maintenance yard perfect for children/pets. Sits on a 557m2 (approx.) block, with wide open spaces in rear and ability to expand (STCA).
Ideal stepping stone into the housing market for first home buyers with ongoing growth in Corio and the waving of stamp duty. Perfect opportunity for savvy investors looking for great rental yield and capital growth to add to your portfolio.
Conveniently positioned a hop step and jump away from both Corio Village Shopping Centre & Norlane pool/ public library. Public transport at your feet and only within minutes of hitting Princes or Ring Road for commuters. Directly across from Corio Bay Senior College. Under ten minutes' drive to Geelong waterfront and CBD, this treasure won't last!
Insights: 14 Goldsworthy Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Opportunity, Get In Quick!
On closer inspection you will notice that this brick veneer home offers so much more than most similar homes in the area.
The home itself has been meticulously cared for and offers three bedrooms with built in robes (master with ensuite) and central bathroom with separate toilet.
The front of the home consists of a great size lounge flowing to an open plan kitchen and adjacent meals area.
Off street car parking is a bonus with a remote double garage, and a large undercover decked entertaining area perfect for entertaining all year round, and a fantastic rear yard allowing the kids and pets to run and play.
Positioned within minutes of the Geelong ring road access, local schools, shopping & medical centres plus the bus route makes this a wonderful family home or ideal investment. Inspection is sure to impress.

Description:
"Immaculate Family Home in Great Location"
It's not often a home of this size in such a great location comes to the market. Beautifully presented and lovingly maintained, the home boasts 4 good-sized bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a light-filled kitchen area, central dining and large lounge with heating. Large pergola at the rear overlooking the established manicured yards and a single garage plus a double tandem lock-up carport. Situated within walking distance to schools, shops, public transport and medical facilities, this property will not last long! Only a minutes drive to Geelong Ring Rd for Melbourne/Surf Coast commuting and just around the corner from Princes Hwy to get you to Geelong CBD in 10 minutes.
-4 Bedrooms
-2 Bathrooms
-Separate Dining/Kitchen/Living Areas
-Outdoor Entertaining Area
-Single Garage
-Double Tandem Carport
-Walking Distance to All Major Amenities
-Close to Geelong Ring Rd & Princes Hwy
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Room for the family.
This outstanding family home will be sure to impress you from the moment you drive through the quiet court location and up to the solid brick facade.
Upon entry you are greeted by a spacious formal lounge and intimate dining area which leads into another living option highlighted by central kitchen with plenty of cupboard space and modern appliances. An open plan meals area and family room gives a large alternative area to entertain. 4 robed bedrooms are on offer, master boasting full ensuite and walk in robe. A second full bathroom services the further bedrooms.
Outdoors is perfect for the entertainer; a huge undercover alfresco entertaining area is the real star whilst it is surrounded by large neat backyard with plenty of north facing sunshine and room for the kids. A double remote garage also provides highly desired drive through access. Extras include gas heating, garden shed, reverse cycle air conditioning and 3kw solar system, saving the owner valuable money on utility bills.
An inspection is sure to impress so do not hesitate!
Insights: 6 Wesson Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Do not let this one get away.
Take advantage today of this exceptional investment opportunity as properties with this much value do not come on the market often.
Situated on an extremely generous allotment of 762m2 (approx.). This neat home provides three comfortable sized bedrooms all including built in robe's, a generous lounge at the front of the property complete with gas heater and ceiling fan, practical kitchen containing ample cupboard space and with an adjoining dining room. The bathroom and laundry are conveniently located in the centre of the property with a separate toilet.
The backyard provides ample room to retain the existing home and construct additional dwellings at the rear (STCA). Conveniently close to all amenities with a short drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, local schools and more. With such a large allotment and so much potential, this is sure to be a well sought after opportunity.

Description:
Let Me Entertain You
This striking family home packs full of features and is sure to surpass all expectations. Set on an (approx.) 523m2 allotment, this 4 bedroom family home offers the perfect family friendly floor plan that is so often requested but rarely found.
The ground floor benefits from a stunning open plan living featuring an updated kitchen, open plan family room as well as a generous meal area that leads you through to the outdoor entertaining area. Other features including gas central heating and split system air conditioning. Upstairs hosts a parents retreat with a fantastic separate living room together with an additional bedroom, ensuite and kitchenette.
Remaining 3 bedrooms are equipped with BIR. The outdoor undercover area will be sure to entertain you, with a built-in BBQ room, woodfire coonara and of course the bar area. The entertaining area flows out to the open deck and out to the easy to maintain backyard.
Are you a shed lover? This home is the home for you, with a 3 vehicle carport, additional single car garage including an automatic vehicle hoist. All this and so much more, so be sure to attend one of the open for inspections.
-4 bedrooms, all with BIR
-2 living areas
-Updated kitchen with gas cooker, d/washer & an abundance of storage
-Parents retreat with ensuite, kitchenette and living area
-Ducted heating with multiple split system air conditioners throughout
-Undercover outdoor entertaining area with wood fire coonara
-Undercover BBQ area with separate open decking
-Low maintenance backyard
-3 vehicle carport, single garage with automatic vehicle hoist
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
Insights: 3 Redfearn Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
How Fast Can You Move?
Whether you are looking for a family home or an ideal investment property this home ticks all the boxes. Located minutes from Corio Village Shopping Centre, Ring Road, schools, Water World Aquatic centre this property presents an ideal buying opportunity. Featuring 3 BRs, all serviced by a central bathroom. The front living room is a bright and airy open plan room which is further enhanced by the natural warmth of floating timber floors. The kitchen meals area is adjacent to the paved under cover out door area and the rear yard is set securely behind high gates creating a safe place for kids to play. With features such as gas heating, air conditioning and electric roller window shutters this home will appeal to just about any buyer - so come along and take a look for yourself.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
The One You Have Been Waiting For
This is it, this is the one! If you're a first home buyer, investor or simply looking for a quality family home, this one is sure to tick all your boxes.
This immaculate family home has everything on your checklist. Positioned in a beautifully quiet pocket of the Rose Park Estate and close to all the amenities. Features of this property are 4 generous sized bedrooms with the Master bedroom having an ensuite as well as a walk in robe.
A central bathroom services the remaining bedrooms. A large formal lounge will ensure the whole family can spend quality time together in pure comfort. A functional kitchen with gas cooktop, oven, good sized pantry and open dining and living room with a sliding door which flows out to the large alfresco which is perfect for all year entertaining and still plenty of space in the backyard, with a well-maintained grass area with an additional large garden shed.
A double garage which has desirable drive through access for any additional storage needs. All this on a sizeable 612m2 (approx) block.
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
This won't last long.
Positioned to please, smack bang in the heart of Corio within easy access to schools, shops & public transport, this wonderful residence is the perfect choice for all home buyers & investors alike.
Internally offering a fully equipped kitchen with adjoining meals area and featuring a flexible floorplan which comprises of three spacious bedrooms all including built in robe's, central bathroom with a separate toilet, a laundry with ample space, and a sun soaked lounge room that includes a gas heater.
The fully fenced and secure backyard is neatly presented and perfect for the kids or the pets to play. A separate SLUG towards the rear of the block and carport provides off street parking and a great space for a potential workshop. All set on 557m2 (approx.). Get in fast as an opportunity like this, will simply not last!

Description:
Ready to move in.
This neat and well maintained three bedroom home sitting behind a charming picket fence presents an amazing opportunity for first home buyers or investors to secure a prime piece of real estate in a great location. Situated on a generous corner allotment of 604m2 (approx.) ready to move in to, with scope to add your own touches in the future and update as you please. The interior encompasses a delightful and spacious lounge complete with split system air conditioning, gas heater and floor to ceiling windows that allow an abundance of natural light to stream through the space. Moving through to the practical kitchen/meals area that comes complete with gas cooking as well as breakfast bench which precedes the well-equipped laundry. All three bedrooms with BIR's lie off the main hall close by the central bathroom. Stepping outside enjoy relaxing in the paved undercover pergola overlooking the generous rear yard with SLUG. Just seconds to the Geelong Ring Road means an easy commute to Melbourne or a 15 minute drive down the Princes Highway to Geelong's CBD. The property also provides close proximity to further amenities such as Corio Shopping Centre, Sporting Facilities, schools and much more.

Description:
A definite stand out.
Generously proportioned and beautifully styled, this attractive brick veneer home has been thoroughly renovated inside and out to provide the new owners a comfortable and convenient lifestyle, with nothing left to do but move in and unpack. Ideal for those looking for an immaculate investment property with a potential rental return of $390 - $400 pw or occupy and enjoy the warm and inviting atmosphere the home radiates. Presenting an exciting opportunity, this spectacular haven is perfect for first home buyers, young families or the astute investor who wants to capitalize in the popular and fast growing suburb of Corio. Graced with gorgeous natural light throughout, this stunning home will quickly gain attention with its open plan living and dining zone, offering a central gas heater and polished floorboards which flow through the home. The spacious kitchen provides breakfast bench and gas cooking as well as access to the generous laundry. Three comfortable bedrooms in total (2 with BIR's) lie adjacent to the family sized bathroom with shower, boasting black matte tap finishing's and large free standing bathtub. Outside you'll find a secure & full fenced rear yard ideal for outdoor entertaining or pets and children to enjoy as well as a SLUG. Situated in a well-established neighbourhood close by to the Hendy Reserve, primary schools and public transport. With only a 2 minute drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, The Geelong Ring Road and the Corio Train Station, all amenities are within easy reach.
Insights: 95 Plantation Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Nesters and Investors act fast.
Well located in the heart of Corio lies this neat as a pin three bedroom home on a 572m2 (approx.) allotment providing an excellent chance for those looking to get a foothold in the property market or a fantastic opportunity for the astute purchaser with a keen eye for value. This home offers a spacious lounge area with floor boards throughout, a gas heater and split system air conditioner, three bedrooms, central bathroom, practical kitchen with plenty of natural light and an impressive rear yard complete with single garage and side drive-way access. It all stacks up favourably for this great package. With Corio's best facilities and services, including Corio Village Shopping Centre, sports facilities, medical centres, schools, pre-schools and the Princess Highway just around the corner.

Description:
Beautiful family home.
Presenting a once in a lifetime opportunity! On offer is this stunning home perfect for a growing family or smart investor looking to add to their portfolio. All on a generous sized allotment of (approx.) 543m2 giving the kids plenty of space to play outside.
Inside you will find an updated home that shows exactly why this property will not last long. Featuring three bedrooms with the main including built in robe's, ceiling fan and a rear access door to the back yard. Renovated central bathroom and separate toilet, kitchen which includes a gas oven, separate gas stove top, a lot of cupboard space and adjacent dining room with enough room to fit a large table and two living areas all heated by ducted heating throughout the home.
Moving outside you step into the undercover alfresco area which will allow for all year round entertaining. Parking is made easy with a double garage and a carport around the other side of the house. Perfectly positioned being only a few minutes drive to Corio central and the Princes Highway, this property is sure to sell quick. Enquire today!
Insights: 26 Paulson Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Investors delight.
Set in the ever growing suburb of Corio, this neat residence offers exceptional value for those searching for a home to occupy or a smart rental investment. Boasting ample scope for the new owners to add their own touches or leave as is, the property provides a function floor plan on a generous sized block of 577m2 (approx.).
Comprising three bedrooms, large lounge room, updated bathroom and a kitchen just waiting for a touch up this home opens up plenty of opportunity for further enhancement. Outside ample off street parking is available in the long side drive-way which leads to a single carport while plenty of grassed rear yard is still available to entertain family and friends. Offering a stress free lifestyle located within easy reach to public transport, schools, shops, parks & sporting facilities.
This opportunity won't last long, so be the first to inspect today.
